<div id="tabbable">
    <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
        <li class="active">
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#ubuntu">Ubuntu</a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#CentOS">CentOS</a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Debian">Debian</a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#ArchLinux">Arch Linux</a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Fedora">Fedora</a>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <div class="tab-content">
        <div id="ubuntu" class="tab-pane active">
            <ul>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 13.04 x64'">Ubuntu 13.04 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 13.04 x32'">Ubuntu 13.04 x32</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 12.10 x64'">Ubuntu 12.10 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 12.10 x32'">Ubuntu 12.10 x32</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 12.04 x64'">Ubuntu 12.04 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 12.04 x32'">Ubuntu 12.04 x32</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 10.04 x64'">Ubuntu 10.04 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Ubuntu 10.04 x32'">Ubuntu 10.04 x32</button>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div id="CentOS" class="tab-pane">
            <ul>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'CentOS 6.4 x64'">CentOS 6.4 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'CentOS 6.4 x32'">CentOS 6.4 x32</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'CentOS 5.8 x64'">CentOS 5.8 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'CentOS 5.8 x32'">CentOS 5.8 x32</button>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div id="Debian" class="tab-pane">
            <ul>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Debian 7.0 x64'">Debian 7.0 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Debian 7.0 x32'">Debian 7.0 x32</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Debian 6.0 x64'">Debian 6.0 x64</button>
                <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Debian 6.0 x32'">Debian 6.0 x32</button>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div id="ArchLinux" class="tab-pane">
            <ul>
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Arch Linux 2013.05 x64'">Arch Linux 2013.05 x64</button>
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Arch Linux 2013.05 x32'">Arch Linux 2013.05 x32</button>
            </ul>
        </div>
        <div id="Fedora" class="tab-pane">
            <ul>
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Fedora 17 x64'">Fedora 17 x64</button>
              <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="machine.imageId" btn-radio="'Fedora 17 x32'">Fedora 17 x32</button>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
